page.title: 09Farming Kirmington & Croxton
page.content:
On this area of land all the farms are part of the Brocklesby Estate owned by the Earl of Yarborough and the Yarborough Trustees. A few fields are part of the large area farmed by the estate themselves and the rest are parts of the nine tenant farms,all of whose farmhouses are within the survey area. The west of the area is chalk while the rest is glacial land.
Manor farm s.beet,pots. East end farm s.beet,pots,strawberries Kirmington Ho.s.beet,pots,peas,and italian rye grass. Church farm s.beet,peas and linseed. Croxton Ho. oilseed Rape. Grange farm potatoes Vale Ho. pots,peas and linseed Ulceby chase pots,and peas Pelham farm peas. All the farms grow Wheat and Barley.
